entries.message:
Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the London location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2026-03-06 00:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2026-03-06 04:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, London instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Madrid location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2026-02-25 23:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Madrid instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.
We are currently experiencing a partial outage in our Frankfurt location. Our network engineers are actively working with our upstream providers to restore connectivity as quickly as possible.
